REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C T f1317 reute b f BC-INDIA-REPORTED-BUYING 03-25 0069

TEXT.TITLE: INDIA REPORTED BUYING TWO WHITE SUGAR CARGOES
TEXT.BODY: India is reported to have bought two white sugar cargoes for April/May shipment at its tender today near 227 dlrs a tonne cost and freight and could be seeking a third cargo, traders said. A British operator is believed to have sold one of the cargoes, while an Austrian concern is thought to have featured in the second cargo sale, they said. Reuter
